M

MemoryAllocationAgent - Class in agent
Java Agent which is loaded before Main class and creates a Transformer

MemoryAllocationDetectionTransformer - Class in agent
MemoryAllocationDetectionTransformer transforms the bytecode of all NEW, NEWARRAY, ANEWARRAY and MULTIANEWARRAY instructions and calls an object registration method after allocating and initializing the object.
MemoryAllocationDetectionTransformer() - Constructor for class agent.MemoryAllocationDetectionTransformer
